documentation:
# Unpublished Events Button Popover

## Overview

The Unpublished Events Button Popover provides a complete solution for managing events that failed to publish to Nostr relays. It combines a button trigger with a badge indicator and a popover list of failed events.

## Features

- **Badge Indicator**: Shows count of unpublished events
- **Popover Interface**: Clean dropdown showing failed events
- **Custom Preview**: Use any snippet to render event previews
- **Retry/Discard Actions**: Built-in callbacks for event management
- **Real-time Updates**: Automatically updates when events publish or fail

## Usage

Best used in application headers, navigation bars, or anywhere users need visibility into failed publishes. The component requires a snippet to render each event, giving you full control over the preview appearance.

apiDoc.name: UnpublishedEventsButtonPopover
apiDoc.description: A button component with badge indicator that opens a popover showing unpublished events. Allows retrying or discarding events that failed to publish to Nostr relays.

props.name: ndk
props.description: NDK instance with cache adapter that supports unpublished event tracking

props.name: eventPreview
props.description: Snippet for rendering each unpublished event. Receives event, relays, lastTryAt, retry(), and discard() functions

props.name: buttonContent
props.description: Optional custom button content. Defaults to cloud upload icon with 'Failed Publishes' text

props.name: emptyState
props.description: Optional custom empty state content. Defaults to 'No unpublished events' message

props.name: class
props.description: Additional CSS classes for the button
